SmartFieldSpec.Name: Current Sponsorship Extension Status
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Current status from sponsorship extension record.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_CHILD_CURRENT_SPONEX_STATUS ( @ASOF datetime ) as begin -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date ;with cteCurrentSponsorshipStatus as (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, (case when c.[DESCRIPTION] = 'Sponsored' then 'Sponsored' else case when (c.[DESCRIPTION] in ('Formerly Sponsored', 'Formerly Prospect Sponsored', 'Prospect Sponsored') or c.[DESCRIPTION] is null) then 'Not Sponsored' else '' end end) as 'CURRENTSTATUS' from dbo.usr_sponsorshipextension --left join dbo.USR_INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE i on i.ID = INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE c on c.ID = CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID where ISCURRENT = 1 ) select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, CURRENTSTATUS from cteCurrentSponsorshipStatus group by SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID,CURRENTSTATUS;
end
